game.name: Maloomify the Ocean
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Workshop, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Partial Controller Support, Includes level editor
game.shortDescription: Maloomify The Ocean is a relaxing puzzle game in which you must fulfill every need of your underwater inhabitants. Each inhabitant has their own personality, so it's important to avoid complications. When all the inhabitants are happy, your game world expands and reveals new, things to discover.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Maloomify The Ocean is a relaxing puzzle game in which you must fulfill every need of your underwater inhabitants. Each inhabitant has their own personality, so it's important to avoid complications. When all the inhabitants are happy, your game world expands and reveals new, things to discover.
